changeSet.author: noguez
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE purchases ( purchase_id bigint PRIMARY KEY, description varchar(255), type varchar(50), purchased_at timestamp ); CREATE TABLE products ( product_id bigint PRIMARY KEY, product_name varchar(100), description varchar(255), price integer, stock integer, quantity integer ); CREATE TABLE products_purchases ( products_purchases_id bigint PRIMARY KEY, product_id bigint, purchase_id bigint, CONSTRAINT fk_products_purchases_product_id FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id), CONSTRAINT fk_products_purchases_purchase_id FOREIGN KEY (purchase_id) REFERENCES purchases(purchase_id) ); CREATE TABLE customers ( customer_id bigint PRIMARY KEY, name varchar(50), email varchar(50) ); CREATE TABLE purchase_customer ( purchase_customer_id bigint PRIMARY KEY, purchase_id bigint, customer_id bigint, CONSTRAINT fk_purchase_customer_customer_id FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id), CONSTRAINT fk_purchase_customer_purchase_id FOREIGN KEY (purchase_id) REFERENCES purchases(purchase_id) );
